document_data.caption: A map showing Graystone in southern Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Graystone
document_data.mainbody: Cantrev '''Greystone''' was a small coastal town located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}{{Cite dragon/376/Realmslore: Sarifal|64}}
document_data.Geography: Graystone was located in southwest Gwynneth in the kingdom of [[Corwell]] along the coast of the [[Trackless Sea]]. The town was situated along the southwestern fringes of [[Kimball Moor]] north of the [[Mere Adammair]].
document_data.History: The town was founded in the {{YearlinkName|1304}}, by Lord [[Kimball]].
